item.description:
Sorry folks - we will have to reschedule as we do not have enough people for this to work!!  Suggest we meet at their parking lot and go to another place in Ispwich - any suggestions from you Ipswich locals???

======================================================

 

We will pay the innkeepers when there -$15 per person plus tax and tip.

Suggestions on a post-luncheon walk invited. If it's a nice day, some of us may enjoy a local stroll - Ipswich natives please give us your suggestions!

Please consider bringing an extra $2-$5 to chip in for the Meetup page if you have been coming to meetups and enjoy - It does cost us money to keep this site running!
item.how_to_find_us: Come around back to the Dining Room!
item.why: It's a favorite tradition of this group! Join us again or for the first time for soup, salad, make-your-own sandwiches in a private dining room at the Ipswich Inn.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Luncheon at the Ipswich Inn // CANCELLED FOR THE INN - SEE NOTE
